item.title: Factional Politics and Leadership Failures Stall Gadwal's Progress: NHPS Chairman Ranjith Kumar
item.description:
<![CDATA[Gadwal: Gadwal's development has been pushed miles away due to ongoing factionalism and dominance-driven politics, claimed Nadigadda Human Rights Protection Committee (NHPS) District Chairman Gongalla Ranjith Kumar during a press conference held today. He accused both the previous and current governments of negligence towards the constituencyâ€™s development.
Key Allegations and Statements:
Speaking to the media, Ranjith Kumar said that intra-party groupism has severely hampered the progress of ...]]>
item.author: The Hans India

item.title: Praja Vaani Cancelled on April 21 Due to Bhoo Bharati Awareness Program: Gadwal Collector
item.description:
<![CDATA[Gadwal: The weekly Praja Vaani (Public Grievance) program scheduled for Monday, April 21, at the Gadwal District Collectorate has been cancelled, according to a statement by District Collector B.M. Santosh Kumar.
The Collector informed that the cancellation is due to ongoing awareness seminars being conducted across the district under the Bhoo Bharati initiative, which will continue until April 29. As a result, the regular Monday grievance redressal program will not take place this week.
He ur...]]>
item.author: The Hans India
